resp = client.indices.create(
    index="index",
    mappings={
        "properties": {
            "price_range": {
                "type": "keyword"
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)

resp1 = client.index(
    index="index",
    id="1",
    document={
        "designation": "spoon",
        "price": 13,
        "price_range": "10-100"
    },
)
print(resp1)
